bibl.title: Galen's Alexandria.

series.title: Columbia Studies in the Classical Tradition.

bibl.title: Ancient Alexandria between Egypt and Greece
bibl.author: VON STADEN, Heinrich

bibl.note: Introduction. - Galen's "Alexandria" before Alexandria. - Food and Drugs. - Urbanization and specialization: therapeutics, snakes, and the death penalty. - Alexandria's medical elite: anatomy, Methodism, exegesis. - A second-century Alexandrian "school" of anatomy?
bibl.seg: William V. HARRIS and Giovanni RUFFINI (Edd.), Ancient Alexandria between Egypt and Greece = Columbia Studies in the Classical Tradition. 26 (Leiden, 2004) pp. 179-215.
